TASK: Craft an item of type: mushroom_stew
inventory=[{"type": "shulker_spawn_egg", "quantity": 34, "index": 15}, {"type": "red_mushroom", "quantity": 1, "index": 16}, {"type": "oak_sign", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "porkchop", "quantity": 39, "index": 21}, {"type": "dark_oak_slab", "quantity": 56, "index": 27}, {"type": "warped_trapdoor", "quantity": 5, "index": 33}, {"type": "acacia_log", "quantity": 1, "index": 35}, {"type": "brown_mushroom", "quantity": 1, "index": 38}, {"type": "dark_oak_sign", "quantity": 2, "index": 39}, {"type": "oak_planks", "quantity": 2, "index": 41}, {"type": "yellow_banner", "quantity": 6, "index": 42}, {"type": "brain_coral_fan", "quantity": 50, "index": 44}]

thought: To craft a mushroom_stew, I need to craft a bowl. To craft a bowl, I need to craft acacia_planks. To craft acacia_planks, I need to move the acacia_log from slot 35 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1
